title: I may be crazy, but was something changed regarding mouse sensitivites?
body: I just took a one week break. Today I played again for the first time and shit just felt weird. It may be because I'm just getting back in the swing of things, but just to make sure, was there anything changed regarding mouse sensitivity, controls, or camera movement? Or am I just crazy. I don't know. Everything just doesn't feel natural to me anymore.
